Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

Chicken Drumstick Package
Old Bay Seasoning

Recipe

Open Chicken Drumstick Package hi
Put chicken in glass bowl in sink hi
Run water until hot hi
Fill bowl with hot water hi
Wait 30 minutes
Wait 12 minutes Put chicken in airfryer @ 400 deg
Mix chicken and sprinkle Old Bay Seasoning hi
Wait 10 minutes Put chicken in airfryer @ 350 deg
